channel.title: How can i add to the co-owner crown and how can i make training more harder?
channel.description:
guy i have 3 questions :
1st. how can i add to the co-owner crown
i made the rights for co owner 4 and for the hiddin admin 5 but idk how to add to the co-owner a crown
2nd. how can i make the training more harder ?
how can i make earing xp more harder i want is 1250 hp per hit how i do it ?
3rd.how can i add an auto message to the server?
i want to add an auto message and i want it every 5 mins ?
BTW the source is all star and thanx

item.title: How can i add to the co-owner crown and how can i make training more harder?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

go to your client class i DO NOT MEAN CLIENT.Class class as in client.java
and search for addSkillXP
fine the Hitpoints or what ever skill and chage the values
for example i want farming to be 100xp per CLICK
SO Mine is currently

addSkillXP((1700 * playerLevel[19]), 19);

REPACE the 1700 to 100/code] save and compile

Read full topic
